StringProperty.Name: Amendment
StringProperty.Description: Splits the MOF file into language-neutral and -specific versions. (-AMENDMENT:Locale)

StringProperty.Name: Authority
StringProperty.Description: Specifies Authority as the authority (domain name) to use when logging on to WMI. (-A:Authority)

StringProperty.Name: CreateBinaryMofFile
StringProperty.Description: Requests that the compiler create a binary version of the Mof file with the name filename without making any modifications to the WMI repository. (-B:Filename)

StringProperty.Name: LanguageNeutralOutput
StringProperty.Description: Name of the language neutral output. (-MOF:Path)

StringProperty.Name: LanguageSpecificOutput
StringProperty.Description: Name of the language specific output. (-MFL:Path)

EnumProperty.Name: MofClass
EnumProperty.Description: Allows/Disallows the creation/updation of classes in MOF files; see the documentation on the -class family of switches for details.

EnumValue.Name: CreateOnly
EnumValue.Description: Requests that the compiler not make any changes to existing classes. When this switch is used, the compile operation terminates if a class specified in the MOF file already exists.

EnumValue.Name: ForceUpdate
EnumValue.Description: Forces updates of classes when conflicting child classes exist.

EnumValue.Name: SafeUpdate
EnumValue.Description: Allows updates of classes even if there are child classes, as long as the change does not cause conflicts with child classes.

EnumValue.Name: UpdateOnly
EnumValue.Description: Requests that the compiler not create any new classes.

EnumProperty.Name: MofInstance
EnumProperty.Description: Allows the creation/updation of instances in MOF files; see the documentation on the -instance family of switches for details.

EnumValue.Name: CreateOnly
EnumValue.Description: Requests that the compiler not make any changes to existing instances. When this switch is used, the compile operation terminates if an instance specified in the MOF file already exists.

EnumValue.Name: UpdateOnly
EnumValue.Description: Requests that the compiler not create any new instances. When this switch is used, the compile operation terminates if an instance specified in the MOF file does not exist..

StringProperty.Name: NamespacePath
StringProperty.Description: Requests that the compiler load the MOF file into the namespace specified as namespacepath. (-N:namespacepath)

StringProperty.Name: ResourceName
StringProperty.Description: Extracts binary MOF from a named resource. (-ER:ResourceName)

StringProperty.Name: ResourceLocale
StringProperty.Description: Extracts the localized MOF descriptions from the binary MOF when used with -ER switch. (-L:ResourceLocale)

StringProperty.Name: SyntaxCheck
StringProperty.Description: Requests that the compiler perform a syntax check only and print appropriate error messages. No other switch can be used with this switch. (-check)

BoolProperty.Name: AutoRecover
BoolProperty.Description: Adds the named MOF file to the list of files compiled during repository recovery. (-autorecover)

BoolProperty.Name: WmiSyntaxCheck
BoolProperty.Description: Requests that the compiler perform a WMI syntax check. The -B: switch must be used with this switch. (-WMI)
